member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION
member.summary: Describes the changes found by the function.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.NextEntryOffset
member.summary: The number of bytes that must be skipped to get to the next record. A value of zero indicates that this is the last record.

summary.para: The type of change that has occurred. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The file was added to the directory.
The file was removed from the directory.
The file was modified. This can be a change in the time stamp or attributes.
The file was renamed and this is the old name.
The file was renamed and this is the new name.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.CreationTime
member.summary: The date and time that the directory or file was created and added to the file system.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.LastModificationTime
member.summary: The date and time that the content of the directory or file was last modified in the file system.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.LastChangeTime
member.summary: The date and time that the metadata or content of the directory or file was last changed in the file system.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.LastAccessTime
member.summary: The date and time the directory or file was last accessed in the file system.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.AllocatedLength
member.summary: The allocated size of the file, in bytes.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.FileSize
member.summary: The new size of the directory or file in bytes, or the old size if the size is unchanged.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.FileAttributes
member.summary: The attributes of the directory or file.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.ReparsePointTag
member.summary: The identifier tag of a reparse point for the directory or file.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.FileId
member.summary: The identifier of the directory or file.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.ParentFileId
member.summary: The identifier of the parent directory for the file.

member.name: FILE_NOTIFY_EXTENDED_INFORMATION.FileNameLength
member.summary: The size of the file name portion of the record, in bytes. This value does not include a terminating null character.

summary.para: A variable-length field that contains the file name relative to the directory handle. The file name is in the Unicode character format and is not null-terminated.
If there is both a short and long name for the file, the function will return one of these names, but it is unspecified which one.
